text.section:
The Secretary shall:
Devise and institute means to prevent and control morbidity and mortality associated with:
Pregnancy;
Childbirth;
Infancy; and
Early childhood; and
Promote the welfare and hygiene of maternity and infancy.

section.section: The Secretary shall establish a Morbidity, Mortality, and Quality Review Committee in the Department.

The Committee shall:
Conduct confidential and anonymous case reviews of morbidity and mortality associated with pregnancy, childbirth, infancy, and early childhood; and
Develop and implement interventions to improve the system of care for pregnancy, childbirth, infancy, and early childhood based on the findings from case reviews conducted under item (i) of this paragraph.
The Secretary shall adopt regulations to implement the requirements of this section.

text.section:
This section does not enable the Secretary:
To take charge of a child if the parent, guardian, or other person who has custody of the child objects; or
To treat the child for a disease without the consent of the parent, guardian, or other person who has custody of the child.
